title: Compactifications of the N=2^* flow
abstract: In hep-th/0004063 Pilch and Warner (PW) constructed N=2 supersymmetric RG flow corresponding to the mass deformation of the N=4 SU(N) Yang-Mills theory. In this paper we present exact deformations of PW flow when the gauge theory 3-space is compactified on S^3. We consider also the case with the gauge theory world-volume being dS_4 instead of R^{3,1}. The solution is constructed in five-dimensional gauged supergravity and is further uplifted to 10d.
